## Setup

Installing austraits.build package

```{r}
remotes::install_github("traitecoevo/austraits.build@develop")
```


## building dataset

Load library:

```{r}
# Load librrary
library(austraits.build)

# Update the build (remake.yml)
austraits.build::setup_build_process()

# Build a datatset
Cassis_2014 <- remake::make("Cassis_2014")

# Build the whole compilation
ausinverts <- remake::make("austraits")

# Delete the cached items to rebuiuld all
remake::make("tidy")
```
